articles.title: Science news this week: 'Anti-aging' magic mushrooms and record-breaking internet speeds - Live Science
articles.description: July 19, 2025: Our weekly roundup of the latest science in the news, as well as a few fascinating articles to keep you entertained over the weekend.

articles.title: Why AI is moving from chatbots to the browser - The Verge
articles.description: With the release of OpenAI’s ChatGPT Agent and Perplexity’s Comet, generative AI is shifting from chatbots to web browsers. Industry insiders view this as the way to develop AI agents that can perform tasks on behalf of people.

articles.title: Apple Sues the YouTuber Who Leaked iOS 26 - WIRED
articles.description: In a lawsuit filed against prominent leaker Jon Prosser, Apple alleges a conspiracy to break into a development device and steal its trade secrets. Prosser insists Apple has it all wrong.

articles.title: Google Fi is offering the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 for just $199.99! - Android Authority
articles.description: If you're willing to get a new Google Fi plan, and have been thinking of buying a Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7, this is the best deal around!

articles.title: 32" 6K ProArt Display From ASUS Launching in Late August - MacRumors
articles.description: ASUS is planning to release its 32-inch 6K ProArt Display PA32QCV in August, with the device set to compete with Apple's Pro Display XDR and...
